creator: CoolBitX Technology
descriptionHtml:
CoolBitX is proud to present the only Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash mobile cold storage cryptocurrency wallet. Welcome to the future of hardware wallets.

This app (made for the CoolWallet S -- the second generation card) is the most convenient and secure way to store, receive, and send your cryptocurrency assets. By combining top-of-the-line security with absolute mobility, your BTC, ETH, LTC, XRP, and BCH has never been safer and easier to use.

Tested and trusted since 2016, with tens of thousands of wallets sold, use the wallet and app to transfer and receive digital assets from tens of millions of people and thousands of merchants across the world.

This app also provides the current US Dollar value for your stored cryptocurrencies. You can create and manage multiple wallets and send and receive digital assets.

CoolBitX Crypto Highlights:

✓ Store Digital Currency: easily store digital currencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple, and Bitcoin Cash directly on the card from app.

✓ Secure your Money: CoolBitX Crypto encrypts and stores your private keys in an isolated, offline environment fortified by a secure element chip (Common Criteria EAL5+ certified) inside the card.

✓ Take your Cryptocurrency Anywhere: send and receive cryptocurrency whenever, wherever, and with whomever you want. Conveniently send your wallet address via email, social media, or QR code.

✓ 100% Wireless: with advanced Bluetooth technology, efficiently transfer your assets to one of the world's most secure environments.

✓ Privacy and Control: offers you total end-to-end control over your digital assets. CoolBitX never stores, has access to, or sells any personal, financial, or secure data. Be your own bank.

✓ Durability and Loss Prevention: your card can take wear and tear. Completely waterproof, it can flex, drop, be stepped on, even become lost without ever compromising your investments.

✓ Free to Use: CoolBitX will never charge you to send or receive cryptocurrency.

About CoolBitX
CoolBitX is a Taiwanese FinTech firm founded in 2014 by hardware security experts specializing in manufacturing US patented digital asset hardware and developing smart contracts using blockchain technology.

Please contact us at info@coolbitx.io for any issues or questions you may have.

This app (made for the CoolWallet S -- the second generation card) is the most convenient and secure way to store, receive, and send your cryptocurrency assets. By combining top-of-the-line security with absolute mobility, your BTC, ETH, LTC, XRP, and BCH has never been safer and easier to use.

Tested and trusted since 2016, with tens of thousands of wallets sold, use the wallet and app to transfer and receive digital assets from tens of millions of people and thousands of merchants across the world.

This app also provides the current US Dollar value for your stored cryptocurrencies. You can create and manage multiple wallets and send and receive digital assets.

CoolBitX Crypto Highlights:

✓ Store Digital Currency: easily store digital currencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple, and Bitcoin Cash directly on the card from app.

✓ Secure your Money: CoolBitX Crypto encrypts and stores your private keys in an isolated, offline environment fortified by a secure element chip (Common Criteria EAL5+ certified) inside the card.

✓ Take your Cryptocurrency Anywhere: send and receive cryptocurrency whenever, wherever, and with whomever you want. Conveniently send your wallet address via email, social media, or QR code.

✓ 100% Wireless: with advanced Bluetooth technology, efficiently transfer your assets to one of the world's most secure environments.

✓ Privacy and Control: offers you total end-to-end control over your digital assets. CoolBitX never stores, has access to, or sells any personal, financial, or secure data. Be your own bank.

✓ Durability and Loss Prevention: your card can take wear and tear. Completely waterproof, it can flex, drop, be stepped on, even become lost without ever compromising your investments.

✓ Free to Use: CoolBitX will never charge you to send or receive cryptocurrency.

About CoolBitX
CoolBitX is a Taiwanese FinTech firm founded in 2014 by hardware security experts specializing in manufacturing US patented digital asset hardware and developing smart contracts using blockchain technology.

Please contact us at info@coolbitx.io for any issues or questions you may have.

title: CoolWallet

creator: CoolBitX Technology
descriptionHtml:
CoolWallet App Releases Web3 Hot Wallet to Help All Users Self-Custody Crypto

Navigate between elite cold and hot storage with a single tap.

Are you blowing hot and cold about keeping your funds on crypto exchanges? It's time to cool down and self-custody your crypto. Don't stress, CoolWallet has you covered.
Who else? Hot + Cold = Cool.

Proof of Keys is the most important consideration for self-custody and mass adoption. That's why CoolWallet, the natural selection for Web3 wallets, is evolving yet again to better serve our community's needs and make our superior wallet security accessible to everyone.

That's right. We are enhancing the CoolWallet App with a new hot wallet module, so we can introduce new Web3 features and more functionality and coin support faster.

This means our users can now use cold storage (CoolWallet Pro and S cold wallet range) and hot storage in one place, the CoolWallet App. Toggle between the two modules with a simple tap on your screen.

CoolWallet Pro users, you'll continue to have the exact same superior cold storage security and intuitive in-app experience, but you now have the option to move funds to your hot wallet to access more exciting features.
CoolWallet App: What's New?

Enhanced Coin Support: get quick access to mainnet cryptos and their ecosystem tokens (e.g. adding custom tokens)
Enhanced Marketplace features: Use our integrations with WalletConnect, OpenSea, crypto exchanges and more
Enhanced ease-of-use: Our brand new and intuitive user interface is designed to give you all the information you need at a glance.

CoolWallet Pro: The best everyday Web3 cold wallet

CoolWallet Pro is a hardware wallet designed specifically for crypto users who seek elite crypto wallet security that fits their lifestyle. It's cold storage in your pocket, created for everyday use, to jump into DeFi, Web3 and NFTs, wherever you are, whatever time it is. After all, crypto markets never sleep, so why should your wallet?

CoolWallet Pro boasts an EAL6+ secure element, 256 AES encrypted Bluetooth, 2+1 FA biometric verification, and a wafer-thin, waterproof smart card design that makes it super easy and discreet to keep close to you. Preferably in your real wallet.


This includes native support of the world's leading crypto mainnets and layer-1 ecosystems:

Bitcoin (BTC) / Ethereum (ETH) / BNB Smart Chain (BNB) / XRP / Cardano (ADA) / Solana (SOL) / Polygon (MATIC) / Polkadot (DOT) / Cosmos (ATOM) / Tron (TRX) / Avalanche (AVAX) / Litecoin (LTC) / Aptos (APT) / USDT, USDC, BUSD (multi-chain) / and more.

Supported Tokens
All ERC-20 / ERC-20 (Arbitrum, Polygon) / ERC-721, ERC-1155 NFT tokens/ BSC BEP-20 / TRC-20 customized tokens.

Battle-tested since 2016, the CoolWallet Pro and S models and CoolWallet App are trusted by over 100,000 users to send, receive, purchase and store digital assets from tens of millions of people and thousands of merchants across the world with confidence.
About CoolBitX

CoolBitX is a Taiwanese Fintech firm founded in 2014 by hardware security experts specializing in manufacturing US patented digital asset hardware and developing smart contracts using blockchain technology.
Please contact us at info@coolbitx.io for any issues or questions you may have.
descriptionShort: The only completely mobile cold wallet. Welcome to the future.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- You can now navigate between cold and hot wallet with a single tap! Your private key is still stored offline in CoolWallet Pro/S while using cold wallet. The new CoolWallet HOT will enable new Web3 features faster .
＊It’s strongly recommended that DO NOT use the recovery phrase of your cold wallet for your new hot wallet. Your cold and hot wallets work independent in CoolWallet App.

Supports both cold and hot wallet storage and trading, features secure in-app Web3 browser, and analyzes Dapp interactions with its integrated Web3 Smart Scan feature.

【Experience a Decentralized Web3 Wallet】
Own your private keys. Take control of your assets.
Combine elite cold storage safety and hot wallet convenience to optimally manage your crypto assets with CoolWallet's dual-purpose Web3 wallet application.

【One Tap to Navigate Between Cold and Hot Wallet Modules】
COLD + HOT = Cool

Experience the CoolWallet App - your powerful and safe Web3 gateway that offers users both the speed of a hot wallet and the unrivaled security of a cold wallet. Enjoy rapid, intuitive features complemented by robust cold storage security, trusted since 2016. With CoolWallet, convenience and security coexist.

【Secure Transactions with Smart Contract Analysis - Smart Scan】
Before finalizing a transaction, the CoolWallet App can scan and detect the transaction target (DApp) and the related smart contract transaction. Smart Scan provides a deep analysis that can detect any abnormalities in order to bolster the security of your transactions.

【Explore Infinite Possibilities with the Web3 Browser】
Navigate seamlessly through the diverse and ever-evolving universe of DApps with our Web3 browser.

【Intuitive Integration with Rich Marketplace Services】
Effortlessly integrate services such as WalletConnect, crypto swap, native staking, and more, all within our intuitive platform. Stay tuned for more exciting features on the horizon.


【Quick Crypto Addition Across Multiple Mainnets】
Swiftly integrate coins and tokens, including custom tokens, from a wide range of mainnet ecosystems.
CoolWallet App supports multiple mainnets, including Bitcoin (BTC) / Ethereum (ETH) / BNB Smart Chain (BNB) / Polygon (MATIC) / Avalanche (AVAX) / Optimism (OP) / Arbitrum (ARETH) / OKX (OKT) / Cronos (CRO) / zkSync Era / Flare (FLR) / ThunderCore (TT), and more.
CoolWallet App also supports a variety of tokens such as stablecoins including USDT, USDC, BUSD (multi-chain support), ERC-20, BSC BEP-20 custom tokens, and non-fungible tokens (NFTs) such as ERC-721 and ERC-1155.

＊In addition to the vast selection of coins and tokens supported, CoolWallet Pro users can further benefit from the inclusion of other renowned blockchains like Tron (TRX) / Cardano (ADA) / Solana (SOL) / Polkadot (DOT) / Cosmos (ATOM) / Tezos (XTZ) / Litecoin (LTC) / Aptos (APT) / XRP, and more. Additional custom tokens such as TRC-20 are also supported. For a complete list of our supported mainnets and tokens, please visit the official CoolWallet website.

【CoolWallet Pro - Your Best Daily Web3 Cold Wallet】
CoolWallet Pro is more than just a crypto cold wallet.
It's a secure, lightweight solution that fits right in your wallet, granting you immediate access to the world of Web3, DeFi, and NFTs at a single tap, anytime, anywhere.

Since 2016, CoolWallet App and Pro/S have been trusted by over 200,000 users through various real-world applications. Supporters of CoolWallet can confidently and securely use CoolWallet to transact, send, receive, purchase, and store digital assets with millions of individuals and institutions worldwide.

【About CoolBitX】
Founded in 2014, CoolBitX is a Taiwan-based fintech innovator steeped in blockchain technology. Led by a team of hardware security experts, CoolBitX not only offers world-leading blockchain security solutions but has also fostered a robust software team. With significant achievements in virtual asset hardware wallets, regulatory technology, and other blockchain application software, CoolBitX continues to push the boundaries of blockchain application innovation.


【Contact Us】
Email: support@coolbitx.com
descriptionShort: Decentralized Web3 Wallet.

- Support New Language - Simplified Chinese

title: CoolWallet

creator: CoolBitX Technology
descriptionHtml:
Supports both cold and hot wallet storage and trading, features secure in-app Web3 browser, and analyzes Dapp interactions with its integrated Web3 Smart Scan feature.

【Experience a Decentralized Web3 Wallet】
Own your private keys. Take control of your assets.
Combine elite cold storage safety and hot wallet convenience to optimally manage your crypto assets with CoolWallet's dual-purpose Web3 wallet application.

【One Tap to Navigate Between Cold and Hot Wallet Modules】
COLD + HOT = Cool

Experience the CoolWallet App - your powerful and safe Web3 gateway that offers users both the speed of a hot wallet and the unrivaled security of a cold wallet. Enjoy rapid, intuitive features complemented by robust cold storage security, trusted since 2016. With CoolWallet, convenience and security coexist.

【Secure Transactions with Smart Contract Analysis - Smart Scan】
Before finalizing a transaction, the CoolWallet App can scan and detect the transaction target (DApp) and the related smart contract transaction. Smart Scan provides a deep analysis that can detect any abnormalities in order to bolster the security of your transactions.

【Explore Infinite Possibilities with the Web3 Browser】
Navigate seamlessly through the diverse and ever-evolving universe of DApps with our Web3 browser.

【Intuitive Integration with Rich Marketplace Services】
Effortlessly integrate services such as WalletConnect, crypto swap, native staking, and more, all within our intuitive platform. Stay tuned for more exciting features on the horizon.


【Quick Crypto Addition Across Multiple Mainnets】
Swiftly integrate coins and tokens, including custom tokens, from a wide range of mainnet ecosystems.
CoolWallet App supports multiple mainnets, including Bitcoin (BTC) / Ethereum (ETH) / BNB Smart Chain (BNB) / Polygon (MATIC) / Avalanche (AVAX) / Optimism (OP) / Arbitrum (ARETH) / OKX (OKT) / Cronos (CRO) / zkSync Era / Flare (FLR) / ThunderCore (TT), and more.
CoolWallet App also supports a variety of tokens such as stablecoins including USDT, USDC, BUSD (multi-chain support), ERC-20, BSC BEP-20 custom tokens, and non-fungible tokens (NFTs) such as ERC-721 and ERC-1155.

＊In addition to the vast selection of coins and tokens supported, CoolWallet Pro users can further benefit from the inclusion of other renowned blockchains like Tron (TRX) / Cardano (ADA) / Solana (SOL) / Polkadot (DOT) / Cosmos (ATOM) / Tezos (XTZ) / Litecoin (LTC) / Aptos (APT) / XRP, and more. Additional custom tokens such as TRC-20 are also supported. For a complete list of our supported mainnets and tokens, please visit the official CoolWallet website.

【CoolWallet Pro - Your Best Daily Web3 Cold Wallet】
CoolWallet Pro is more than just a crypto cold wallet.
It's a secure, lightweight solution that fits right in your wallet, granting you immediate access to the world of Web3, DeFi, and NFTs at a single tap, anytime, anywhere.

Since 2016, CoolWallet App and Pro/S have been trusted by over 200,000 users through various real-world applications. Supporters of CoolWallet can confidently and securely use CoolWallet to transact, send, receive, purchase, and store digital assets with millions of individuals and institutions worldwide.

【About CoolBitX】
Founded in 2014, CoolBitX is a Taiwan-based fintech innovator steeped in blockchain technology. Led by a team of hardware security experts, CoolBitX not only offers world-leading blockchain security solutions but has also fostered a robust software team. With significant achievements in virtual asset hardware wallets, regulatory technology, and other blockchain application software, CoolBitX continues to push the boundaries of blockchain application innovation.

Before finalizing a transaction, the CoolWallet App can scan and detect the transaction target (DApp) and the related smart contract transaction. Smart Scan provides a deep analysis that can detect any abnormalities in order to bolster the security of your transactions.

【Explore Infinite Possibilities with the Web3 Browser】
Navigate seamlessly through the diverse and ever-evolving universe of DApps with our Web3 browser.

【Intuitive Integration with Rich Marketplace Services】
Effortlessly integrate services such as WalletConnect, crypto swap, native staking, and more, all within our intuitive platform. Stay tuned for more exciting features on the horizon.


【Quick Crypto Addition Across Multiple Mainnets】
Swiftly integrate coins and tokens, including custom tokens, from a wide range of mainnet ecosystems.
CoolWallet App supports multiple mainnets, including Bitcoin (BTC) / Ethereum (ETH) / BNB Smart Chain (BNB) / Polygon (MATIC) / Avalanche (AVAX) / Optimism (OP) / Arbitrum (ARETH) / OKX (OKT) / Cronos (CRO) / zkSync Era / Flare (FLR) / ThunderCore (TT), and more.
CoolWallet App also supports a variety of tokens such as stablecoins including USDT, USDC, BUSD (multi-chain support), ERC-20, BSC BEP-20 custom tokens, and non-fungible tokens (NFTs) such as ERC-721 and ERC-1155.

＊In addition to the vast selection of coins and tokens supported, CoolWallet Pro users can further benefit from the inclusion of other renowned blockchains like Tron (TRX) / Cardano (ADA) / Solana (SOL) / Polkadot (DOT) / Cosmos (ATOM) / Tezos (XTZ) / Litecoin (LTC) / Aptos (APT) / XRP, and more. Additional custom tokens such as TRC-20 are also supported. For a complete list of our supported mainnets and tokens, please visit the official CoolWallet website.

【CoolWallet Pro - Your Best Daily Web3 Cold Wallet】
CoolWallet Pro is more than just a crypto cold wallet.
It's a secure, lightweight solution that fits right in your wallet, granting you immediate access to the world of Web3, DeFi, and NFTs at a single tap, anytime, anywhere.

Since 2016, CoolWallet App and Pro/S have been trusted by over 200,000 users through various real-world applications. Supporters of CoolWallet can confidently and securely use CoolWallet to transact, send, receive, purchase, and store digital assets with millions of individuals and institutions worldwide.

【About CoolBitX】
Founded in 2014, CoolBitX is a Taiwan-based fintech innovator steeped in blockchain technology. Led by a team of hardware security experts, CoolBitX not only offers world-leading blockchain security solutions but has also fostered a robust software team. With significant achievements in virtual asset hardware wallets, regulatory technology, and other blockchain application software, CoolBitX continues to push the boundaries of blockchain application innovation.
